biotools.summary: Comparative and interactive viewer for microbial genomes, designed to run as either a web-based tool (Flash technology) or a desktop application (AIR environment). The basis of the program is a generic genome browser with sub-maps holding information about genomic objects. The software is characterized by the presentation of syntenic organisations of microbial genomes and the visualization of polymorphism data along these genomes; these features are accessible to the user in an integrated way.

bioschemas.name: SynTView
